import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button, Card, Input } from '../components/UI'; import sdaLogo from '../assets/sda_logo.png'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [showSearch, setShowSearch] = useState(false); const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const quickActions = [ { name: 'MOBILE MONEY GIVING', icon: 'üì±', color: '#28a745', path: '/giving' }, { name: 'CARD GIVING', icon: 'üí≥', color: '#007bff', path: '/giving' }, { name: 'LIVE STREAM', icon: 'üî¥', color: '#dc3545', path: '/live' }, { name: 'PRAYER REQUEST', icon: 'üôè', color: '#6f42c1', path: '/prayer' }, { name: 'ANNOUNCEMENTS', icon: 'üì¢', color: '#fd7e14', path: '/announcements' } ]; const upcomingEvents = [ { id: 1, title: 'Sabbath Divine Service', date: '2024-01-13', time: '11:00 AM', location: 'Main Sanctuary' }, { id: 2, title: 'Youth Camp Registration', date: '2024-01-20', time: '9:00 AM', location: 'Youth Hall' }, { id: 3, title: 'Health Fair', date: '2024-01-27', time: '10:00 AM', location: 'Fellowship Hall' } ]; const recentSermons = [ { id: 1, title: 'The Power of Prayer', speaker: 'Pastor Johnson', date: '2024-01-06', thumbnail: 'üé•' }, { id: 2, title: 'Walking in Faith', speaker: 'Elder Smith', date: '2023-12-30', thumbnail: 'üé•' }, { id: 3, title: 'God\'s Love for Us', speaker: 'Pastor Johnson', date: '2023-12-23', thumbnail: 'üé•' } ]; return (
